title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Differentiated Social Learning Design Based on Optimizing Middle School Students' Learning Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish personalized learning plans by analyzing their learning readiness, interests, and profiles.
Learners can apply a differentiated learning model leveraging social competencies during group collaboration.
Learners can generate project deliverables reflecting flexibility in content, process, and product.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
